changes.description:
"The MetaPlatform Dashboard is the internal admin surface for the AI-powered system layer that governs Wombat Track and its subcomponents (e.g. Docs Module, Phase Tracker, DriveMemory, Claude dispatchers).
It serves as:
‚Ä¢ A control tower for system status, agent dispatches, memory sync, and module health
‚Ä¢ The operational cockpit for MetaPlatform-level services
‚Ä¢ The foundation for future agent deployment, governance alerts, and module orchestration"
changes.goals:
"Future expansions will include:
‚Ä¢ Agent RAG status
‚Ä¢ Live dispatch triggers
‚Ä¢ MemoryPlugin controls
‚Ä¢ GPT/Claude model switches
‚Ä¢ Integration maps (Drive, GitHub, Notion)"
